articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Anti-Aircraft Artillery Academy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Anti-Aircraft Artillery Academy
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Anti-Aircraft Artillery Academy.
					 He went round the monument to the revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il, the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the academy.
					
					 At the room for studying pinpoint shot methods he watched cadets in their training.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the teaching staff of the academy have dedicated their wisdom and efforts to steadily improving the quality of military education and training the cadets to be competent officers desired by the Party.
					
					 He set forth important tasks that would serve as guidelines in further improving the work of the academy as required by the developing reality and modern warfare.
					
					 He toured different parts of the academy to learn about its management.
					
					 Walking the large compound of the academy, he was very satisfied to see it turned into a thick woodland and greenery and an orchard.
					
					 Going round the mess, he noted that it is clean and perfect in hygienic condition and high in the level of mechanizing food processing and has built a bean-sprout cultivation room well.
					
					 He saw the visual aid materials on display along the walls of corridor of the soldiers' hall and stressed the need to conduct in an effective way the five-point education, set forth by the Party, and put big efforts on the education in the greatness of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, class education and moral education in particular. And he said that the hall is well built with locally available materials and its soundproof is admirable.
					
					 He also went round the greenhouse without a heating system, mushroom cultivation room and breed-fish ground.
					
					 Noting that the academy is good at bean growing, mushroom cultivation and fish breeding, as demanded by the Party, he said that it is cultivating many agaric funguses at the greenhouse by solving the issue of substrate by use of bean straw and breeding such various species of fishes as grass fish, Ryongjong fish and catfish after building breed-fish ground and feed production base on its own efforts and even planted frijol on non-farming land. This shows that its officials use their own brains and work hard to carry out the policies of the Party, he added.
					
					 The teaching staff of the academy have done good things, fully implementing all of what the Party instructed, he said, stressing that such eye-opening achievements could be made as the academy worked on the Party's idea and line, regarding them as standards and yardstick of its activities. He estimated the academy as a brisk unit thorough in implementing the Party's instructions.
					
					 Expressing his pleasure over the inspection of the academy, he repeatedly praised it as an exemplary unit for the entire army as well as the whole country.
					
					 He gave an instruction to widely introduce and generalize the successes and experience of the academy to the entire army and the whole country and launch a vigorous campaign of modeling after it.
					
					 He had a photo session with its teaching staff and servicepersons.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So and Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Gifts to Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage
 Wonsan, June 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent gifts to the Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage.
					 He personally initiated the construction of the baby home and orphanage on the picturesque east coast and provided a series of field guidance to the construction sites so that not a single defect was manifested in carrying out the project. 
					
					 He visited the baby home and orphanage prior to their ceremony of completion on the International Children's Day to show profound loving care for the children.
					
					 He sent fruits and varieties of nutritive foodstuff to the children who moved into their new homes.
					
					 Ceremonies of conveying the gifts were separately held at the baby home and orphanage on Saturday.

articles.title: FM Accuses U.S. of Again Pulling up DPRK over Its Satellite Launch for Peaceful Purposes
articles.content:
FM Accuses U.S. of Again Pulling up DPRK over Its Satellite Launch for Peaceful Purposes
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Friday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the U.S. accusation against the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes:
					 The U.S. State Department let its senior advisor on strategy and communications cry out for international pressure on the DPRK, terming its satellite launch a violation of the UNSC "resolutions" which ban all lift-offs by use of ballistic technology.
					
					 The U.S. accusation against the DPRK over its just and legitimate satellite launch under the pretext of violation of the "resolutions" is a wanton infringement and challenge to its sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is inviolable as it is an exercise of a legitimate independent right of a sovereign state publicly recognized by international law, which is above UNSC resolutions.
					
					 Among UN member states the U.S. is the only country which takes the lead in taking issue with the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch, another example clearly proving the U.S. extreme hostile policy toward the latter.
					
					 The U.S. asserts that all its satellite launches are legitimate but the DPRK's all satellite launches are illegal. This robber-like insistence is the height of the U.S.-style double standards and a revelation of ill-intentioned inveterate repugnance toward the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's status as a satellite manufacturer and launcher can never change no matter how desperately the hostile forces negate it, and its space development is not something which can be given up because of someone's opposition.
					
					 It is the firm resolution and will of the DPRK to push back the frontiers of latest science and technology in the field of space development, too, in order to protect the self-esteem and dignity of the nation. 
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces will have no alternative but to watch the DPRK's satellites soaring into the outer space one after another till they will come to realize how illegal and foolish their attempt to check the DPRK's legitimate satellite launches by dint of the above-said "resolutions" is.

articles.title: Philippines President Hopes for Korean People's Success
articles.content:
Philippines President Hopes for Korean People's Success
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Mun Song Mo, DPRK ambassador to Philippines, presented his credentials to its President Benigno Simeon Cojuangco Aquino on June 8.
					 The president wished the Korean people success in their drive for social well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Delegation of Supreme Public Prosecutors Office Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of Supreme Public Prosecutors Office Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme Public Prosecutors Office headed by Director Jang Pyong Gyu left here Saturday to visit Russia.

articles.title: Delegation of Central Bank Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Central Bank Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Bank led by President Kim Chon Gyun came back home Saturday after taking part in the 24th International Bank Congress held in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Delegation Here
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A Taekwon-Do delegation headed by Leong Wai Mengï¼Œvice-president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, arrived here Saturday to take part in a memorial service marking the 13th anniversary of death of Choe Hong Hui, former president of the federation.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Body
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Peruvian Body
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship on Saturday with the approach of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Syrian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Syrian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Union of Syrian Peasants led by Chairman Hammad Abboud Al Saud visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The guests looked round the historic relics preserved with much care at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President. 
					
					 They also went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Pyongyang City Mushroom Farm, the Rungna Dolphinarium, etc.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Opens to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday. It was opened here to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 On display at the venue of the exhibition is a photo of leader Kim Jong Il meeting with President Kim Dae Jung on a visit to Pyongyang. 
					
					 There are photos showing the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul with the most ardent patriotism to accomplish the cause of national reunification, the long-cherished desire of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The photos show the feats he performed by providing the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of national division, making the whole land of Korea seethe with strong enthusiasm for reunification. 
					
					 There are also photos documenting the dynamic actions of Koreans to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the steadfast will of the service personnel and people in the DPRK to resolutely smash the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group to stifle the DPRK and their moves to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon and other officials concerned, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification and Pyongyangites. 
					
					 Kim Wan Su, secretary general of the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea who doubles as chairman of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, made an opening address.

articles.title: DPRK Players Win Gold Medals at 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Win Gold Medals at 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK players continue proving successful at the 2015 Asian Junior Wrestling Championship.
					 In the 54kg men's Greco-Roman category, Ri Se Ung trounced his Uzbek, Japanese and Iranian rivals, thus winning a gold medal on Friday. 
					
					 And O Kyong Ryong finished first in the 49 kg women's category.
					
					 Kim Su Jong and Pak Mi Gyong bagged silver medals in the 43 kg and 46 kg women's categories respectively.

articles.title: Construction of Power Station Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Construction of Power Station Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- In the DPRK the construction of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station No. 2 is progressing apace by dint of army-people coordinated operation.
					 In recent one month alone, the embankment of nearly 2,000 cubic meters and the concrete tamping for substructure of generator room were carried out before starting the construction of generator room on a full scale.
					
					 Its builders also carried all at once such projects as the bedrock excavation and concrete tamping for surge tank of several hundred cubic meters and embankment of nearly 1,000 square meters for the tank.
					
					 Meanwhile, soldier-builders carried out 40 percent of building over 170 blocks of dwelling houses.
					
					 In April when visiting the station under construction, supreme leader Kim Jong Un stressed the need to display the might of army-people coordinated operation in its construction.
					
					 This served as a source of mental power arousing all the army-civilian builders to work such miracles in the construction of Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station No. 2.
					
					 The builders are now pushing ahead with the construction of the power station while ensuring high speed and quality of construction.

articles.title: U.S. Wholly to Blame for Sparking Nucleara Race: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Wholly to Blame for Sparking Nuclear Race: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the bill on national defense right now under discussion at the U.S. Senate contains an expression that the DPRK is a "nuclear weapons state". 
					 The bill reportedly refers to the fact that a nuclear race is festering in South Asia, centering on India and Pakistan, a similar race is under way between Iran and Israel and this is likely to lead to a sustainable nuclear proliferation throughout the Mideast.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article observes in this regard: 
					
					 The U.S. is wholly to blame for the hot nuclear race in different parts of the world. 
					
					 It is the arch criminal who used nuclear technology originally meant to contribute to the promotion of people's well-being for manufacturing WMDs and imposed the nuclear disaster upon humankind for the first time in human history. 
					
					 It spread the technology of nuclear weapons in violation of the spirit of the NPT.
					
					The constant threat and blackmail posed by the U.S. to the non-nuclear countries with nukes in a bid to realize its ambition for hegemony were factors that sparked the nuclear-proliferation and nuclear race. 
					
					NPT bans the nuclear powers from threatening the non-nuclear countries with nukes. However, the U.S. arrogantly behaved as if it was free from NPT and only other countries were bound to it. 
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to have access to nuclear weapons for self-defence. 
					
					 As regards the nuclear rivalry, the world expresses deep concern about the U.S. which has irresponsibly acted as a nuclear super-power. 
					
					 The U.S., cesspool of evils, will be held wholly responsible for the nuclear race.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Smear Campaign
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group let subsidized institutes and plot-breeding organizations spout a spate of such vituperation as painting DPRK workers active overseas for economic cooperation as those "doing slave labor" and "subject to exploitation." 
					  Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says: The south Korean puppet regime is getting frantic in the "human rights" smear campaign against the most advantageous socialist system under which the dignity and rights of the popular masses are guaranteed at the highest level. What it is trumpeting is sheer nonsense. 
					
					  Exploitation of human beings was brought to a definite end in the DPRK long ago, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					  South Korea is a typical unpopular society where slave labor and exploitation by capital are rampant even in the 21st century.
					
					  It is a modern-day slave society and the puppet group is hordes of cruel exploiters who suck the blood of the masses to bring profits to outsiders and seek luxury and glory.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the puppet group in hatching plots over the "human rights" issue of DPRK workers overseas. It is designed to intensify the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket and bring down the dignified socialist system at any cost.
					
					 The puppet group's noisier anti-DPRK "human rights" ruckus would only precipitate its destruction.

articles.title: Attention of Int'l Community Focused on DPRK's Status as Nuclear Weapons State: KCNA
articles.content:
Attention of Int'l Community Focused on DPRK's Status as Nuclear Weapons State: KCNA
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The attention of the international community is now focused on the DPRK's nuclear capability. 
					 It is the unanimous comment that the DPRK was compelled to have access to nukes due to the U.S. constant threat and the nuclear force of the DPRK cannot but be bolstered up unless those countries concerned strive hard to defuse the tension on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Such views were expressed by experts of different countries on the Korean affairs. 
					
					 Alexandr Vorontsov, section chief of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, recently said, when interviewed by the broadcasting service Sputnik, that the U.S. is pushing the DPRK to the action to bolster up nuclear force. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 "Since long before the DPRK has proposed the U.S., Japan and south Korea many times for productive dialogue. However, all proposals for resuming dialogue were neglected and turned down. Under this situation the DPRK cannot but interpret all the U.S. 'peace declarations' as nothing but fig-leaf to cover up its sinister intent. Therefore, the DPRK has no other choice but to focus on increasing the defence capability. To this end, the DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear deterrence, among other things."
					
					 This is an objective and fair observation. 
					
					 A British expert on Korean affairs in an article dedicated to the UK paper Guardian asserted that north Korea's access to nukes is an established fact and north Korea will never give up its nuclear program, adding diplomacy is the only way for settling the nuclear issue of north Korea. 
					
					 It was known that the U.S. Department of Defense in an annual report in 2008 termed the DPRK nuclear weapons state, creating a stir. It was reported recently that the bill on national defense right now under discussion at the U.S. Senate contains an expression that the DPRK is a "nuclear weapons state," sparking sensation. 
					
					 There is opinion in the U.S. about whether its Congress began to recognize north Korea as "a de facto nuclear weapons state". There are even assertions that the nuclear issue of north Korea should be dealt with after recognizing it as "a de facto nuclear weapons state." 
					
					 In the final analysis, this means the DPRK's access to nukes became an established fact long ago and the international community recognized the DPRK as a nuclear power standing against the U.S. nuclear blackmail and threat, no matter who recognizes it or not.
					
					 The above-said facts prove with added clarity that the DPRK was quite just when it insisted on the stand that nuclear weapons have to be countered in kind and that the nuclear stick of the aggressors must be broken with a treasured nuclear sword of justice.
					
					 Clear is the reason why the DPRK opted to bolster the nuclear force, not just content with its access to nukes.
					
					 It is because the U.S. has persistently pursued its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and the countries concerned responsible for it are not making efforts for the detente on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 An international internet site headquartered in London in a recent article said north Korea showed off its military muscle through the test of SLBM early in May. Some countries said it gave a shock to regional security. But north Korea's traditional rivals are resorting to all the more threatening acts. Neighboring countries are not making any effort for detente even though they are well aware of this. It is impossible to settle the nuclear issue without defusing tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the Russian Foreign Ministry said the resumption of the six-party talks and the diplomatic solution to the issue can be possible through the defusing of the tense military and political situation on the peninsula and in its vicinity.
					
					 It is self-evident that the greater threats the U.S. and its followers pose to the DPRK by resorting to all sorts of muscle flexing, the stronger the self-reliant defence capabilities of the DPRK will grow with main emphasis on the nuclear force. This can never be subject to controversy.
					
					 Action is bound to invite reaction and the DPRK's reaction is stronger countermeasure.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, we would like to solemnly warn the U.S. and its followers once again that those who step up their hostile policy toward the DPRK will only face self-destruction.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Minjok Ilbo, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on June 11 demanded the immediate withdrawal of the  U.S. forces seeking a dangerous germ warfare against the north.
					 It was opened to public that the U.S. forces set up a germ lab in the Osan U.S. air force base before any other U.S. military bases overseas long ago and have made preparations for germ warfare, the editorial recalled.
					
					 It is a revelation of the plan for germ warfare prepared by the U.S. in secrecy according to the "Jupiter plan", the editorial noted. 
					
					 It demanded the early withdrawal of the U.S. forces, the source of all evils, attempting the dangerous germ warfare.

articles.title: S. Koreans Resolve to Stage Action for Democracy
articles.content:
S. Koreans Resolve to Stage Action for Democracy
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- 747 personages of civic and public organizations of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on June 10 marking the 28th anniversary of the June Popular Resistance at which they formed the People's Action for Democracy, according to Jaju Sibo, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Speakers denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for violating democracy, deteriorating people's living, betraying the nation and seeking the permanent division of the country.
					
					 The aim of the organization is to eliminate the "yusin" remnants, terminate the tragedy of division and reunify the country, they held.
					
					 They declared they would launch the second action for democracy in the spirit of the June Popular Resistance.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Blocking Joint National Event
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Blocking Joint National Event
 Tokyo, June 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, issued a statement on June 11.
					 Reflecting the indignation of all Koreans in Japan desirous of peace and reunification, the statement bitterly denounced the south Korean authorities for blocking the joint national event, pursuant to foreign forces' line and confrontation with fellow countrymen, and blatantly challenging their aspiration and desire to pave a wide avenue to the independent reunification this significant year.
					
					 The south Korean authorities craftily worked to abort the June 15 joint national event, thus fully revealing their despicable colors as hordes of traitors keen to deny and scrap the north-south joint declarations, programmes for reunification common to the nation, it noted.
					
					 The Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification will take the lead in the struggle to meet all challenges and pave a wide avenue to the independent reunification in solidarity and alliance with the compatriots in the north and the south and abroad under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Int'l Public Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Int'l Public Figure 
Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il will always go down in the history of the Korean revolution and the Korean people's struggle for accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					  Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, said this in a statement on June 9.
					
					  Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung to victoriously advance the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence, the secretary general noted, and went on:
					
					  He, ardent patriot, dedicated himself to building a socialist power with all its domains developed, a country with its people's living standard steadily improved and its economic potential remaining strong thanks to a high level of modernization.
					
					 He built the Workers' Party of Korea, the staff of the revolution, into the strong party representing the interests of the Korean people and the dignified party steering the revolution and construction to victory.
					
					 He also developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces capable of foiling all provocations and aggression moves of the imperialists at one blow and a driving force of the revolution and construction.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to put an end to the tragedy of national division forced by outsiders, ushering in the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Myanmar
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was formed at the building of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on June 5.
					 Tha Win, member of the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and secretary of its Yangon Regional Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events such as meeting, friendship gathering, film show and photo exhibition and extend solidarity to the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people on the occasion of the anniversaries.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- A Mongolian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the liberation of Korea was inaugurated in Ulan Bator on June 5.
					 The chairman of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminar, film show and photo exhibition from June 10 to October 10.

articles.title: History of WPK Introduced by Mongolian Political Figure
articles.content:
History of WPK Introduced by Mongolian Political Figure
Pyongyang, June13 (KCNA) -- The history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the great one in which it has led the revolution and construction to victory by rallying the Korean people around it.
					 The general secretary of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Mongolian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the WPK and the liberation of Korea on June 5.
					
					 He said that the cause of the popular masses for independence could be pioneered and make progress thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who founded and developed the WPK.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Serbian Political Party
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Serbian Political Party
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia released a statement on June 8 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is the historic one reflecting the will and desire of all Koreans in the north and the south for peaceful reunification.
					
					 The declaration was provided thanks to the indomitable will and efforts of leader Kim Jong Il who energetically worked for Korea's reunification day and night.
					
					 It serves as a banner for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea as it fully reflects the idea of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It provided a bridge for the reunification of Korea divided by the U.S. imperialist aggressors into the north and the south and brought the Korean people the hope for reunification.
					
					 We extend full support to the Korean nation in its struggle for implementing the joint declaration in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Support and Solidarity for Struggle of WPK and Korean People Voiced in Myanmar
articles.content:
Support and Solidarity for Struggle of WPK and Korean People Voiced in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- We extend full support and solidarity to the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean  people to carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un.
					 The Myanmar preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the WPK and Korea's liberation said this in a press release issued at its inaugural ceremony on June 5. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, led the protracted anti-Japanese revolution to victory, liberating the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and founding the WPK, the staff of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Thanks to the outstanding ideas and theories of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their energetic guidance the WPK has developed into the mother party serving the interests of the popular masses and tested political force triumphantly advancing the revolutionary cause of Juche, and the DPRK has demonstrated its might as the socialist politico-ideological and military power and the people-centered country fully ensuring the independent rights of the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the great leaders, is building the DPRK into an invincible socialist power and people's paradise where their ideal is being translated into brilliant reality.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Missile Test-Fire against DPRK Denounced in UK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Missile Test-Fire against DPRK Denounced in UK
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on June 5 accusing the Park Geun Hye puppet group of its reckless test-fire of missile against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Of late the south Korean puppet forces test-fired a missile directly aiming at the DPRK and are loudly advertising as if the test was a big success and claiming that it is capable of striking all areas of the latter.
					
					 This goes to prove how frantically the south Korean puppet forces are pursuing the confrontation with the DPRK and how just the latter was when it took the measure for steadily bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The corrupt and incompetent south Korean puppet regime can never provoke the DPRK advancing under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, should bear in mind that they can never defeat socialist Korea no matter how desperately they egg the south Korean puppet forces on to the confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Mexican, Polish Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Mexican, Polish Personages
 Pyongyang, June 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Mexico and Poland on June 5 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "My Country Winning Victories Thanks to Single-minded Unity".
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said in a speech that Kim Jong Il was a distinguished statesman who turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 The general secretary praised him as a veteran statesman in the world as he frustrated the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and defended the socialist cause under the banner of independence against imperialism.
					
					 Juzef Lachut, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party, and other personages praised Kim Jong Il for firmly consolidating the WPK to be the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and an ideologically pure entity and an integral organization.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona Escuela de Oficiales Artilleros Antiaereos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona Escuela de Oficiales Artilleros Antiaereos
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Escuela de Oficiales Artilleros Antiaereos.
					Recorrio la lapida a la actividad historico-revolucionaria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					En la sala de estudio del metodo de tiro de punteria, vio ejercicios de los cadetes.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que los maestros y empleados estan dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion para formar bien a los cadetes como oficiales competentes deseados por el partido, al mejorar sin cesar la calidad de la educacion militar.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia en el mejoramiento de las labores de la escuela de oficiales conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo y a la exigencia de la guerra moderna.
					
					Estuvo en varios puntos de la Escuela para hacer conocimiento del estado del mando y la administracion de la unidad.
					
					Caminando por el recinto amplio y fresco, mostro gran satisfaccion diciendo que se realizo perfectamente la reforestacion, la creacion de jardines y huertas fruticolas.
					
					En el comedor senalo con satisfaccion que es muy limpio aunque sea el comedor popular, mantiene la seguridad higienica, realizo la mecanizacion de la elaboracion de alimentos y acondiciono bien el lugar de cultivo de brotes de soyas.
					
					Mirando a los materiales de propaganda grafica colgados  en las paredes del corredor de la casa de los militares, subrayo que deben organizar con esmero la educacion de los estudiantes en 5 tipos presentados por el Partido, sobre todo, esforzarse por la educacion en la grandeza de los Lideres, en la clase y en la moral. Y en el interior de la casa apunto que la casa hecha con las materias abundantes en la localidad esta bien insonorizada.
					
					Recorrio tambien el invernadero sin calefaccion, el lugar de cultivo de hongos y la piscina de reproduccion de peces.
					
					Dijo que la escuela hace bien el cultivo de soya y de hongos y la cria de peces conforme a la orientacion del partido, cosecha muchos agaricos en el invernadero al solucionar con estabon el problema de materiales de cultivo de hongos, cria peces herbivoros, siluros y otros peces al construir por la propia cuenta el lugar de reproduccion de peces y la base de produccion de piensos y siembran en la tierra no roturada el frijol trepador, lo que demuestra claramente cuan esfuerzos dedican los funcionarios para materializar las orientaciones del partido.
					
					Recalco que los profesores y empleados de la Escuela hicieron excelentes trabajos, estan ejecutando todas las ordenes del partido y pueden lograr considerables exitos porque toman la idea y la linea del partido como pauta y cartabon de todos los trabajos y agrego que la escuela ejecuta estrictamente las ordenes del partido.
					
					Al decir que recorrio la escuela con satisfaccion, la alabo como unidad ejemplar y prototipo a alardear tanto en todo el ejercito y todo el pais.
					
					Dio las instrucciones de divulgar ampliamente en todo el ejercito y en toda la sociedad los exitos y las experiencias alcanzados por la Escuela y normalizarlos y aprenderlos.
					
					El Mariscal se retrato con los maestros y los empleados y los uniformados de la Escuela.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So y Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan
Wonsan, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio regalos al hospicio y orfanato de Wonsan.
					El Mariscal tomo la iniciativa de construirlos en la pintoresca costa del Mar Este y dirigio minuciosamente la obra visitando en varias ocasiones el campo de construccion. En visperas de su inauguracion, o sea, el dia primero de junio, dia internacional de infancia, volvio a visitarlos.
					
					Esta vez, el Mariscal envio frutas y varios alimentos nutritivos a los ninos quienes se mudaron a nuevas casas.
					
					Tuvieron lugar el dia 13 respectivamente en el hospicio y el orfanato los actos de entrega de los regalos.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX rechaza la acusacion de EE.UU. al desarrollo de cosmos de RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX rechaza la acusacion de EE.UU. al desarrollo de cosmos de RPDC
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un reportero de la ACNC en relacion con que Estados Unidos volvio a acusar el derecho de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos, el portavoz de MINREX de la RPDC dio el dia 12 la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos dias, EE.UU., por conducto de un asesor superior de la comunicacion estrategica del Departamento de Estado, aboga por la presion internacional a la RPDC, acusandola de lanzamiento de satelite como violacion a la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que prohibe todo el lanzamiento de proyectil con la tecnologia balistica.
					
					La misma acusacion al lanzamiento justo y legal de la RPDC bajo el rotulo de la "resolucion" del CS de la ONU es una violacion flagrante a la soberania de esta.
					
					El lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC es un digno derecho independiente de un pais soberano reconocido por la ley internacional, razon por la cual nadie lo puede detener.
					
					EE.UU. es el unico pais que censura perversamente el lanzamiento legitimo de satelite de la RPDC, lo que demuestra claramente la politica extremadamente hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					El lanzamiento de sus satelites es legitimo, pero ilegitimo el de nuestros satelites, esta insistencia bandidesca es un climax de la puta de doble rasero al estilo norteamericano y una manifestacion del veto morbido e innato de EE.UU.
					
					No se variara la posicion de la RPDC, pais fabricador y lanzador de satelite aunque las fuerzas enemigas lo nieguen y  no es una labor renunciable el desarrollo de cosmos aunque alguien se lo oponga.
					
					Superar el nivel sofisticado tambien en el dominio del desarrollo de espacio para mantener la dignidad y el honor de la nacion, es nuestra firme decision y voluntad.
					
					EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles se veran obligados a observar solo el lanzamiento de los satelites de la RPDC hasta cuando se den conscientes cuan ilegal y absurda sera la intencion de impedirlo con la "resolucion" del CS de la ONU.

articles.title: Es inevitable la posesion de armas nucleares de RPDC, ratifica ACNC
articles.content:
Es inevitable la posesion de armas nucleares de RPDC, ratifica ACNC
Pyongyang, 13 de junio (ACNC) -- La sociedad internacional estima que la posesion de armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es inevitable por la incesante amenaza de Estados Unidos y que se consolidaran de continuo las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC mientras los paises interesados no se esfuercen por el alivio de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					Hace poco, el director del Instituto del Oriente de la Academia de Ciencias de Rusia, Alexandr Vorontsov, en la conferencia de prensa concedida con la radio Sputnik, recordo que el portavoz de la cancilleria coreana declaro otra vez que las armas nucleares de la RPDC son para hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear y la agresion militar de EE.UU. y continuo:
					
					"La RPDC considera todas las 'declaraciones de paz' de EE.UU. como cortinas de humo para ocultar su verdadera intencion y no tiene otro remedio mas que concentrarse en el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional. Para ese fin, ella consolida el disuasivo nuclear."
					
					Es la estimacion objetiva e imparcial sobre la posesion de armas nucleares y la consolidacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Otro especialista en asuntos coreanos insistio en su articulo publicado en el periodico britanico Guardian que es un hecho consumado la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC. Y apunto que la RPDC no renunciara nunca las armas nucleares y que la solucion del problema nuclear del Norte de Corea depende de los medios diplomaticos". 
					
					Por otra parte, el Departamento de Defensa norteamericano registro en su informe anual de 2008 la RPDC como pais poseedor de armas nucleares. 
					
					Y hace poco, el articulo intitulado "Estimacion sobre el ambiente nuclear del mundo" del "proyecto de ley para autorizacion de defensa nacional", que esta en analisis en el  senado estadounidense, fijo a la RPDC como "pais dotado de armas nucleares". 
					
					En el interior de EE.UU. se preguntan si el congreso comienza a reconocer el Norte de Corea como "pais con armas nucleares" y se presenta hasta la insistencia en que hay que tratar el problema nuclear del Norte de Corea reconociendolo como "pais poseedor de armas nucleares". 
					
					Como vemos, la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC se hizo un hecho consumado y la sociedad internacional la reconoce como disuasivo para hacer frente a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					No se necesita cuestionar mas la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Y se ha comprobado otra vez que es justa la posicion de la RPDC de responder a las armas nucleares con las armas nucleares. 
					
					Nos vemos obligados a consolidar de continuo las fuerzas armadas nucleares, debido a la anacronica politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC y al desprecio de los paises interesados al alivio de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El sitio web internacional con sede en Londres " Global Risk Insides " transmitio que a principios de mayo pasado el Norte de Corea manifesto sus fuerzas armadas a traves del lanzamiento de prueba de proyectil balistico de submarino. Continuo que algunos paises lo describieron como un "impacto" a la seguridad regional, pero los tradicionales paises hostiles muestran acciones mas amenazantes y los  paises perifericos no hacen esfuerzos por el alivio de la tension aunque lo conocen. Enfatizo que es imposible resolver el problema nuclear sin el alivio de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Rusia expreso la posicion de que la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas y la solucion diplomatica de este tema son posibles solo por la distension de la situacion politica y militar de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles intensifiquen la amenaza contra la RPDC recurriendo a la provocacion de guerra y a las intrigas de toda indole, mas consolidaremos la capacidad de autodefensa nacional mediante las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					En esta oportunidad advertimos de nuevo a EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles que las fanaticas maniobras de hostilidad a la RPDC les llevaran al arruinamiento.
